page.title: 03Education
page.content: {A School Day for Gemma-}I hurry into School just in time for the whistle to blow at 8.55am.Later on the register is taken and we had our spelling test. I got 20/20. The first lesson we had was Language and in that lesson we did French.Then at 10.00am we went into Maths in which we did percentages. 10.30am was breaktime in which I had a packet Salt-n-Vinegar flavoured crisps.After break we had History. After Dinner break it was Language and Maths again.Then came 2.30pm and everyone packed up to go out to break. The teacher blew the whistle to show that break was over. Silence struck for 5 minutes and in walked Mrs Shand our form teacher. We read for about 20 minutes.At 3.27pm Mrs Shand told us to pack up to go home.
